zoksilv: I am amazed by what you do while being chronically ill. I’m stuck in bed every day and mourn my healthy life, but I hope I can get to a point where I can still put on a brave face and show everyone how awesome I am. Thanks for showing us that it can be done!!!

autumnshaymartin: Love you! 💕 Btw, possibly dumb unsolicited advice, but I have IBS and I just realized a couple of months ago, after 8 years of symptoms, that tight belts and waistbands REALLY aggravate flare ups for me, and it only occurred to me after I saw another person with IBS post about their problem with belts.
